physical_appearance: "The image shows a set of twenty four pieces of paper. The one on the extreme top left is a note. There is a note that states, ""These drawings of Indian heathen temples & idols were done by a native artist and given to me by the Rev Symons (?) of Madras"". Four of the drawings are in the portrait orientation while the other nineteen are in the landscape orientation. The drawings follow a similar pattern in that a single pillar is featured
title_text: Drawings of South Indian Architectural Temple Figures with note Drawings of South Indian Architectural Temple Figures
subject_terms_1: together with an image of a Hindu deity or idol in the middle." deities Hinduism notes temples (buildings) idols
subject_terms_2: religious art Hindu gods Hindu temples Art and architecture Drawing Idols and images
